dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 533 IH: To revoke the charter of incorporation of the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma at the request of that tribe, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Mullin (for himself, Mr. Cole, and Mr. Young of Alaska) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To revoke the charter of incorporation of the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma at the request of that tribe, and for other purposes.

section.text: The request of the Miami Tribe of Oklahoma to surrender the charter of incorporation issued to that tribe and ratified by its members on June 1, 1940, pursuant to the Act of June 26, 1936 (25 U.S.C. 501 et seq.; commonly known as the Oklahoma Welfare Act), is hereby accepted and that charter of incorporation is hereby revoked.
